title: Top 5 best landing spots in 'Fortnite' Chapter 2, including Frenzy Farm
text:
Chapter 2 of "Fortnite Battle Royale" brought massive changes to the video game. The in-game map was completely changed with the new release, and players can now explore new places on the island.

In this article, we will count down five best landing spots in the current season of "Fortnite Battle Royale." This list could help you when you're deciding where to drop at the start of the match.

1 Frenzy Farm Frenzy Farm is very similar to Fatal Fields from Chapter 1. This place has a lot of loot and a huge house in the center of it. Additionally, players can get wood from structures and metal from the machinery around the farm. 2 Pleasant Park Pleasant Park has been brought back to Chapter 2 and it has retained the same layout. Although there are a few differences between the current area and the original version, this place is still an amazing landing spot, and considering that players are familiar with it, it is much easier to navigate and find cover there. 3 Sweaty Sands 4 Steamy Stacks 5 Slurpy Swamp
